column1: Kata Robata////I really like Kata Robata
column2: they have really good quality sushi
column3: and I ordered a variety of menu items for curbside pick up
column4: and all of it was pretty much as good as you can get for taking it to go. The experience is obviously not comparable to dining in
column5: but for those who are still staying away from eating inside restaurants
column6: this is not a bad choice.
